option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
read command line options from the file cfname.
plot starting from the date yyyymmdd.
plot starting from the time hr:mn.
stop plotting at the date yyyymmdd.
stop plotting at the time hr:mn.
plot an interval whose extent is hr:mn.
set the width of the plot to width.
set the height of the plot to height.
plot the real (I) component of the I&Q samples.
plot the imaginary (Q) component of the I&Q samples.
plot the power of the I&Q samples on a logarithmic scale.
only plot the I&Q samples from beam number bmnum.
only plot the I&Q samples from channel chnum for stereo mode data.
plot I&Q samples from the interferometer array instead of the main array.
set the color of the real (I) component to aarrggbb, specified as the hexadecimal value for the 32-bit alpha,red,green and blue component color [default is teal].
set the color of the imaginary (Q) component to aarrggbb, specified as the hexadecimal value for the 32-bit alpha,red,green and blue component color [default is red].
set the color of text to aarrggbb, specified as the hexadecimal value for the 32-bit alpha,red,green and blue component color [default is white].
set the background color to aarrggbb, specified as the hexadecimal value for the 32-bit alpha,red,green and blue component color [default is black].
set the panel background color to aarrggbb, specified as the hexadecimal value for the 32-bit alpha,red,green and blue component color [default is black].
set the axes and tick mark colors to aarrggbb, specified as the hexadecimal value for the 32-bit alpha,red,green and blue component color [default is white].
set the major grid line color to aarrggbb, specified as the hexadecimal value for the 32-bit alpha,red,green and blue component color [default is gray].
set the minor grid line color to aarrggbb, specified as the hexadecimal value for the 32-bit alpha,red,green and blue component color [default is gray].
plot any labels using the font fontname.
set the font size to fontsize points.
plot the title using the font tfontname.
set the title font size to tfontsize points.
set the extent of the Y-axis to +/-ymax when plotting I&Q components.
set the first I&Q sample plotted to xmin.
set the number of I&Q samples plotted to xnum.
set the X-axis major tick mark interval to xmajor.
set the X-axis minor tick mark interval to xminor.
set the Y-axis major tick mark interval to ymajor.
set the Y-axis minor tick mark interval to yminor.
the filename of the iqdat format file to plot.
connect to the xterminal named display.
open the window, xoff pixels from the left edge of the screen.
open the window ypad pixels from the top edge of the screen.
set the delay between frames to delay milliseconds, a value of 0 will pause the frame until a mouse button is pressed. Default: 0

synopsis.p: Plot raw I&Q samples from a iqdat format file.

description.p: Plot raw I&Q iqdat format files.
The output is to the X terminal. The program acts as a "virtual" oscilloscope allowing the user to replay I&Q samples taken at the radar.

example.description: Plot the I&Q samples from the iqdat file called "20080318.iqdat" on the X terminal.
